summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BrandPulse Media Intelligence Dashboard. All core features working perfectly including news search, AI sentiment analysis, watchlist operations, and UI/UX elements.
passed_tests: API Root Endpoint - Backend connectivity verified
News Search (Tesla) - 20 articles fetched with sentiment analysis
News Search (Apple) - 20 articles fetched with sentiment analysis
Individual Sentiment Analysis - OpenAI GPT-4o-mini integration working
Watchlist Save - Articles successfully saved to MongoDB
Watchlist Get - Saved articles retrieved correctly
Frontend Page Load - All components loaded properly
Search Functionality - Input validation and search working
Sentiment Stats Display - Positive/negative/neutral counts accurate
Article Cards - All 20 articles displayed with sentiment badges
Save to Watchlist - Frontend-backend integration working
Remove from Watchlist - Delete functionality working
UI/UX - Dark theme with teal accents implemented correctly
Empty States - Proper empty state handling on dashboard and watchlist
